original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 311.00/50 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields opened steady on Tuesday and the rupee opened stronger at 311.00/50 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 28.00/25 percent, steady from 28.00/50 percent at Monday’s close.
The rupee opened at 311.00/50 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 311.70/312.20. (Colombo/May16/2023)
